org.ow2.chameleon.rose
Interface ImporterService

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractImporterComponent
public interface ImporterService

The component providing this service are capable of creating a proxy thanks to an EndpointDescription.

Author:
barjo

Method Summary

Method Detail

importService

org.osgi.service.remoteserviceadmin.ImportRegistration importService(org.osgi.service.remoteserviceadmin.EndpointDescription description,
                                                                     Map<String,Object> properties)
Reify the endpoint of given description as a local service.

Parameters:
description - The EndpointDescription of the endpoint to be imported.
properties - optional properties (must be crushed by the description properties if conflict).
Returns:
An ImportRegistration.

getConfigPrefix

List<String> getConfigPrefix()
Returns:
The configuration prefix used or defined by this ImporterService. (i.e json-rpc,org.jabsorb,jax-rs.

getAllImportReference

Collection<org.osgi.service.remoteserviceadmin.ImportReference> getAllImportReference()
Returns:
All ImportReference of services imported through this service.
